purpose: Facilitates the automation and orchestration of cloud-native infrastructure and DevOps tasks
principle: Leverages Kubernetes and cloud-native technologies to automate infrastructure management and DevOps workflows
reusability: Offers integration with Kubernetes and other cloud-native tools, supports extensible plugins for custom workflows
limitations: Primarily focused on Kubernetes environments; may require adaptation for non-cloud-native infrastructures
